text: ITC SRA Sangeet Sammelan is an annual Indian classical music festival organised by ITC Sangeet Research Academy held by turn in various cities in India. ==History== The first ITC Sangeet Sammelan was held in 1971. ==See also== *List of Hindustani classical music festivals * Swara Samrat festival ==References== ==External links== * Official site * Category:Music festivals established in 1971 Category:Hindustani classical music festivals Category:Music festivals in India
title: ITC SRA Sangeet Sammelan
